description: This focused workshop provides over 3 hours of high-quality video training on editing your own personal videos in Adobe® Premiere Elements® 11. Trainer Chad Perkins starts by introducing you to the Premiere Elements workspace and explaining how to bring video files into the program. Next, you'll learn how to assemble your video clips into great-looking movies complete with titles, transitions, and special effects. Chad will also show you some of the new features in Premiere Elements 11, such as viewing your videos and photos on a map based on where they were taken. Finally, you'll learn how to share your movies with friends and family on DVDs or the Web.
title: Introduction to Adobe Premiere Elements 11
